A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have been a lifelong fan of the movies and read some of the extended universe.  The originals shaped my young life and are some of my fondest memories.  

This movie did not disappoint me at all.  I am always worried when they add another layer onto the things I love because it is hard to measure up.  Even with an extra digression or two that slowed it down\, I found this movie to be wonderful and powerful.  I feel like the new cast members have stepped up and am enjoying watching my old heroes pass on the torch.  

It is almost impossible now to be really surprised by a movie\, especially with the formulas of the modern mass media\, but there were moments in this where I was truly and surprisingly moved and delighted.  I feel they took what I loved and made it richer.  

I will say it gets better with repeated viewings.
